ios._comment_appleId: Your Apple ID email used for App Store Connect
ios._comment_ascAppId: Get this from App Store Connect: My Apps > Your App > App Information > General Information > Apple ID
ios._comment_appleTeamId: Get from Apple Developer portal: https://developer.apple.com/account > Membership > Team ID (format: ABC1234567)

_instructions: Fill in the iOS submit values above before running 'eas submit --platform ios'. You can also skip these and EAS will prompt you during submission.
